revised_title: Freezing-Point Curves of Binary Alloys: Silver, Copper, and Other Metals
tldr: This article presents the complete freezing-point curves of binary alloys containing silver, copper, and other metals. The authors conducted experiments to determine the freezing points and compositions of various alloys using platinum electrical resistance pyrometers. The results provide insights into the behavior of metals and their compounds, contributing to the understanding of metallurgy and material science.
